snippet: With this trip, the president is following through on his pledge to pivot American foreign policy away from the frustrations of the Middle East and toward Asia’s promising future.
lead_paragraph: With this trip, the president is following through on his pledge to pivot American foreign policy away from the frustrations of the Middle East and toward Asia’s promising future.

headline.seo: Obama’s Subtle Game Will Impress Asians
headline.main: To Impress Asia, Leave the Drama Home
headline.print_headline: To Impress Asia, Leave the Drama Home
